760:934: vāhīke ca jāḍyasādharmyādgośabdaḥ prayujyate-gaurayaṃ vāhīka ityevamādi|
760:935: na ca tathā kaścidaguṇāvayavagandho'pi tantuṣu tatsaṃyoge vā prāgutpattyabhāve nirātmanaḥ kāryasyāstīti|
760:938: prāgavyapadeśyaṃ vastumātraṃ viprakṛtaṃ jāyata iti cet|
760:961: vada somya kathaṃ yāti pratītyā vastu vastutām||
760:962: iha khalu bhavatāmahetuko vināśaḥ sarvotpattimatāṃ nityasaṃnihitaḥ|
760:963: tasmiṃśca sati janmasthitiśaktikriyā na vidyante, virodhāt|
760:966: tadasminnasati kiṃ pratītya asannirātmakaṃ vastu vastutāṃ yātītyācakṣva|
760:970: kathaṃ tarhi sa bhāvo naṣṭa ityucyate ?
760:980: yatkhalu nisvabhāvaṃ nirātmakaṃ hetūnpratītya jāyate tasya khalu svabhāvo nāsti|
760:981: na hi tatkāraṇeṣu pratyekamavasthitaṃ nāpi bhāgaśo nāpyanyatra kvacit|
760:983: yacca na kvacidasti tatkatamena svabhāvenotpatsyata iti nāsti svabhāvaḥ|
760:990: tasya tarhi hetavo vidyamānasya kamupakāraṃ kurvantīti ?
760:992: na khalu dravyasvabhāvāstitvaṃ prati kañcidupakāraṃ kurvanti|
760:993: na ca svabhāvasyāpekṣya prajñaptiḥ| kiṃ tarhi ?
760:996: tadyathā'bhijātasya rājaputrasya vidyamānasya mantriṇaḥ sabalasamudayāḥ parigrahānugrahamātreṇopakurvanto rājatvaṃ kurvantyevamanāgatasya vastunaḥ sato hetupratyayāḥ sametya lakṣaṇamātra(traṃ)
760:1006: tathā kāraṇasāmagrye sati dharmāṇāṃ kriyāsāmarthyamupajāyata iti draṣṭavyam|
760:1013: yastu manyate'tītaṃ karmābhāvībhavatyanāgataṃ ca na vidyate taṃ pratyapadiśyate-
760:1019: atra pratyavatiṣṭhante dārṣṭāntikāḥ-na brūmaḥ sarvathā'tītaṃ na vidyate|
760:1020: kiṃ tarhi ? dravyātmanā na vidyate prajñaptyātmanā tu saditi|
760:1027: yadi tarhyanāgataṃ cakṣurādidravyaṃ vidyate kasmānna paśyati na dṛśyate na vijānāti ?
760:1034: dṛṣṭaṃ hi pradīpādyaṅgavaikalye vartamānasyāpi cakṣuṣo rūpādarśanam|
760:1039: tatra keṣāñcidasāṃnidhyaṃ bhavati tadvaikalyātkāritraṃ na karotīti|
760:1046: chātrāsanamadhyāsya na hi sarvajñapravacanagāmbhīryaṃ sadevakenāpi lokena śakyaṃ tarkamātreṇāvaboddhum|
760:1052: anāgatasya khalu dharmasya vartamānādhvasaṃpātādantaraṅgavahiraṅgasāmagryāṅgaparigrahāt labdhasāmarthyasya dharmasya yaḥ phalākṣepastatkāritramityucyate|
760:1054: tatra yo brūte'nanyatkāritramiti tasya dravyasvabhāvaparityāgaḥ prasajyate||
760:1058: yadi dravyātmano nānyathātvaṃ kiṃ tarhi hetū[n] pratītya jāyate ? brūmaḥ-
760:1060: tathā śaktistathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā||
760:1074: te khalvete bhavatkalpitāstrayaḥ svabhāvāḥ pūrvameva pratyūḍhāḥ|
760:1083: yasmi vā vastuni saṃyukto'prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastu ?
760:1085: syādvastuni saṃyukto na ca tadvastvaprahīṇaṃ yathā tāvaddarśanamārge|
760:1087: duḥkhajñāne utpanne samudayajñāne cānutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaṃ vastu prahīṇaṃ bhavati|
760:1093: navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yo yaḥ prakāraḥ pūrva prahīṇastasminprahīṇe'pi śeṣaistadavalambibhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto vijñātavyaḥ||
760:1097: tata eva [ta]dvispaṣṭaṃ gamyate-amuṣminvastuni iyanto'nuśayā anuśerata iti|
760:1102: dharmāstāvat kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu pratyekaṃ pañcaprakārā duḥkhādidarśanaheyā apraheyāśca nirmalā iti ṣoḍaśa bhavanti|
760:1114: kasya vijñānasya katame dharmā gocarā iti ?
760:1118: kāmāvacarāḥ khalu duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāprahātavyā dharmāḥ pratyekaṃ pañcānāṃ vijñānānāṃ gocarībhavanti|
760:1125: ekasya ca rūpāptasya bhāvanāprahātavyasya kuśalasyānāsravasya ceti|
760:1130: rupāvacaro hi duḥkhadarśa[na]prahātavyo dharmaḥ aṣṭānāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam|
760:1135: bhāvanāprahātavyasya ca kuśalasya ūrdhvaikasyārūpyāvacarasya bhāvanāprahātavyasya kuśalasyānāsravasya ca|
760:1159: traidhātukānāṃ pañcānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ ye'ntyāstrayaḥ prakārā ṇi(ni)
760:1170: evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ dharmāṇāmetāni ṣoḍaśacittāni traidhātukāni pañcaprakārānya(ṇya)
760:1184: avyākṛtasya tu vipākajasya manobhaumasya sukhasaumanasyopekṣāsaṃprayuktasyānāsravasya ca duḥkhadharmajñānasamudayadharmajñānatatkṣāntisaṃprayuktasya vijñānasya|
760:1191: rūpāvacare tvakliṣṭe kāmāvacaradharma gocarā eva rūpāvacarāḥ sarvatragāḥ,
760:1193: [333] catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ|
760:1239: caturthe'pi khalu mārgadarśanaheye vijñāne kāmāvacarāstrayo mārgadarśaṇa(na)
760:1242: parivṛtte tu khalu vijñāne kāmāvacarāścatvāro ṇi(ni)
760:1248: rūpāpte prathame'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ||
760:1250: rūpāvacare prathame khalu vijñāne kāmāvacarāstrayo duḥkhasamudayavisabhāgadhātvālambanāḥ saṃprayogataḥ|
760:1322: cakṣurindriye khalu bhāvanāheyāḥ sarvatragāścānuśayāḥ kāmāvacararūpāvacarā anuśerate|
760:1323: evaṃ yāvatkāyendriye cakṣurdhātau rūpadhātau cakṣurvijñānadhātau yāvadvistareṇa kāyavijñānadhātau yāvadrūpaskandhe vācyam||
760:1349: tatrāpi sarvatragasaṃprayukte cetasi asarvatragā vardhanta iti trayo bhavanti|
760:1355: [347] duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ|
760:1374: tatra yathāyogaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyāḥ rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtāvalambanāḥ,
760:1377: tatpunaḥ sukhendriyālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ yasya cittasyālambanaṃ taccittaṃ sukhendriyā lambanālambanam|
760:1379: tatkhalu sukhendriyālambanaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ cittaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam ?
760:1380: tasyaiva ca dvādaśavidhasyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudaya[darśana] prahātavyasya|
760:1382: tatrārūpyāvacarau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāśca catvāro nikāyāḥ,
760:1387: manaindriye khalu sarvatraidhātukāḥ ye'pi te nirvāṇālambanāste'pi saṃprayogataḥ|
760:1396: adhunā ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ kasya cittasya samanantaraṃ kati cittānyutpadyanta ityupadiśyante(te)|
760:1398: bhavatyanantaraṃ ṣaḍ vā tasyorddhvaṃ pañca pañca vā||
760:1402: ścyutvā rūpadhātāvupapadyate tasya tatratyāni pañca bhavanti|
760:1406: ekaṃ vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa||
760:1423: tatra kliṣṭaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ sānuśayaṃ yadaprahīna(ṇa)kleśam|
760:1425: tatra kliṣṭaṃ cittamanuśayaiḥ saṃprayuktairaprahīṇaiḥ sānuśayaṃ tadālambanaiścāprahīṇaiḥ|
760:1426: kathamiha yo'nuśayo yena cittena saṃprayuktaḥ sa khalvaprahīna(ṇa)
760:1428: yāvaddhi tadanuśayānuprāptiviśeṣeṇa sā cittasantatiravaṣṭabdhā cādhiṣṭhitā ca bhavati,
760:1429: niṣyandaphalasya cānāgatasya tasyāṃ cittasantatau sabhāgaheturutpattaye kṛtāspado bhavati,
760:1431: tasya punaḥ kleśāśīviṣasya prāptidraṃṣṭrāvabhaṅge kṛte vidyamāno'pi san kleśastasmiṃścetasyanarthānutpādanāt sannapi saṃprayogataḥ nānuśeta ityucyate|
760:1434: na tu kadācinmuñjeśīkāvaduddhṛtya śakyate tasmāt kleśaḥ cittātpṛthakkartuṃ nirnāśayituṃ vā svālambanādvā vimukhīkartum|
760:1435: uktaṃ hi- “yo dharmo yasya dharmasyālambanaṃ kadācitsa dharmastasya dharmasya nālambanam ?
760:1445: tayā ca satkāyadṛṣṭyā tatsaṃprayuktayā cāvidyayā sahāyabhāvena cānuśayāne ca sānuśayam|
760:1473: iha tāvad bālasya pañcopādānaskandhātmake duḥkhe saṃmugdhasya phalabhūtā[n] pañcopādānaskandhānajānataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭirūpajāyate|
760:1476: tasyaivaṃ bhavati-yadi tāvadayaṃ nityo'vikārī puruṣaḥ kiṃ dharmeṇa yaḥ sukhena nānugṛhyate,
760:1484: ’ tasya khalu mithyādarśanabhūtagrahāvedha śādaśreyasi śreyobuddhyā pravṛttasyānagra(gre)
760:1485: cāgryabuddhyabhiniviṣṭasya svapakṣe rāgo bhavati parapakṣe ca dveṣaḥ pravartate|
760:1490: kalyāṇamitrapāpamitrasaṃsargāddhi prāyeṇa śraddhādīnāṃ guṇānāmeṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ samu[dā]cārapravṛttiḥ ācāryāṇāmabhimateti|
760:1504: atha ya ime bhagavatā traya āsravā ākhyātāḥ- “kāmāsravo bhavāsravo'vidyāsravaśca|
760:1507: [360] vyavidyāḥ sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāmāsravo mataḥ|
760:1536: apaharanti śleṣayanti ca tathaivaikākinyo'pi dṛṣṭaya iti|
760:1551: tatra kāmayoga eva sahā'vidyayā kāmopādānaṃ catustriṃśad dravyāṇi|
760:1586: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ tisro dṛṣṭayaḥ parāmarśasaṃyojanaṃ dve dṛṣṭī|
760:1587: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ pṛthaguktam ?
760:1601: tadyathā-satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti|
760:1603: avarā hi kāmadhātūretāni ca tadanuguṇāni| yasmāt
760:1610: yadā khalu strotaāpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇe ṣaṭ kleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayānā(-traya)
760:1615: pravartakagrahaṇe khalu pravartyamapi gahītaṃ bhavati pradīpālokavat|
760:1629: satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ khalu sarvānarthamalānāṃ kleśasya ca bhavatrayasya ca mūlam|
760:1631: mārgasya ca sadbhūtasya pratyarthibhūtaḥ kumārgāvalambī śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ|
760:1639: yathā khalu trayo'ntarāyā mārgagamane bhavantyagantukāmatā'nyamārgagrahaṇaṃ mārgabahutvasaṃdehācca mārgagamanāpratipattiḥ|
760:1644: vicikitsā mārgasaṃśaye sati mārgāpratipatti[ritye]ṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ strotaāpannasya dyotayadbhagavānkleśatrayasyaiva grahaṇamakārṣīditi||
760:1667: ete ca trayo mūlakleśāḥ ṣaḍvijñānabhaumāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ|
760:1672: tatra gṛhī abhidhyayā viṣayeṣu grathitastadvyāghātakartṛṣu vivādamārabhamāno dveṣeṇānubadhyate|
760:1678: ye tāvatkhalu kleśā upakleśā api te cittopakleśanāt|
760:1680: ye'pi cānye caitasikāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāḥ te'pyupakleśā ityākhyāyante||
760:1681: ke punaste kleśamalāḥ kāni vā paryavasthānāni ?
760:1721: yaduta-ahrīkyauddhatyamadamātsaryakuhanālapanānaimittikatānaiṣpeśikatā lābhena lābhasya niścikīrṣatā pāpecchatā mahecchatecchasvitā kāmajñātijanapadavitarkapāpamitratādayaḥ|
760:1793: atha kaḥ kleśaḥ kayā vedanayā saṃprayujyate ?
760:1837: dvābhyāṃ māyā tathā śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣo middhaṃ tathaiva ca||
